recipes.title: Simple Indian Tofu Curry
recipes.summary: A hearty and flavorful Indian tofu curry with potatoes, carrots, and peas in a creamy coconut milk sauce.
steps: Heat oil in a large pot or Dutch oven over medium heat. Add onion and cook until softened, about 5 minutes.
Add garlic and ginger and cook for 1 minute more.
Stir in curry powder, turmeric, cumin, and chili powder (if using). Cook for 1 minute, stirring constantly.
Add potatoes and carrots. Cook for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Pour in coconut milk and vegetable broth. Bring to a simmer.
Add tofu and peas. Reduce heat to low, cover, and simmer for 20 minutes, or until vegetables are tender.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Garnish with fresh cilantro before serving.

recipes.title: Thai Green Curry with Tofu and Vegetables
recipes.summary: A vibrant and aromatic Thai green curry featuring tofu, cauliflower, and spinach in a light coconut milk broth.
steps: Heat oil in a wok or large skillet over medium heat. Add onion and cook until softened, about 5 minutes.
Add garlic and ginger and cook for 1 minute more.
Stir in green curry paste and cook for 1 minute, stirring constantly.
Add cauliflower and cook for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Pour in coconut milk and vegetable broth. Bring to a simmer.
Add tofu and spinach. Reduce heat to low, cover, and simmer for 10 minutes, or until vegetables are tender and spinach is wilted.
Stir in lime juice. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Serve hot with rice (rice not included in ingredients).

nutrition.fat: 15-20g per serving (lower than Recipe 1 due to light coconut milk)

recipes.title: Japanese-Inspired Tofu and Vegetable Curry
recipes.summary: A delicate Japanese-style tofu and vegetable curry with carrots, potatoes, and peas in a light coconut milk base.
steps: Heat oil in a small saucepan over medium heat. Add onion and cook until softened, about 3 minutes.
Add garlic and ginger and cook for 30 seconds more.
Stir in curry powder and coriander. Cook for 30 seconds, stirring constantly.
Add carrots and potatoes. Cook for 3 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Pour in coconut milk and vegetable broth. Bring to a simmer.
Add tofu and peas. Reduce heat to low, cover, and simmer for 10 minutes, or until vegetables are tender.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Serve hot with rice (rice not included in ingredients).

nutrition.fat: 10-15g per serving (lowest among the three recipes)
